structure.unit: ARTICLE X. DOWNTOWN KENDALL SYSTEM BETTERMENT

text.section:
Sec. 32-206. Properties exempt from charges.
Properties and buildings located south of North Kendall Drive, east of the Palmetto Expressway (S.R. 826) and northwest of the Metrorail Corridor which are receiving water and/or sewer service or have previously obtained contractual commitment for water and/or sewer service from the Department on the effective date of this ordinance shall not be subject to payment of the special water and sewer construction connection charges; however, the charge shall be imposed for additional water and/or sewer capacity furnished after said date.
